ocr_results.text: BIBLIOGRAPHY
Zhang Ruifang, Suiyue youqing: Zhang Ruifang huiyilu (Years of friendship: the
memoirs of Zhang Ruifang),Beijing: Zhongyang wenxian chubanshe, 2oo5.

tion),Beijing: Zhongguo shehui chubanshe, 1999.
Zhou Yang, Wo yu ‘Di-erci woshou(The Second Handshake and I),Beijing:
Zhonggong dangshi chubanshe, 2007.
Zhang Yuanpei,Xinhua Jingju tuan bianxie de “Longjiang song”wei he beiesha”

ZhaoKezhong,Shanghai“gushihui” de xingcheng jiqi licheng’(Shape and course

Beijing: Zhongguo xiju chubanshe, 2o04.

Zhongguo dianyingjia xiehui,eds.,‘Sirenbang’shi dianying shiye de sidi:Wen-

Zhongguo dianyingjia xiehui dianyingshi yanjiubu, ed., Zhonghua renmin

Zhongguo dianying nianjian,1981(China flm yearbook),Beijing:Zhongguo

Zhongguo dianying ziliaoguan,Zhongguo yishu yanjiuyuan dianying yanjiusuo,

Zhongguo wujutuan,Mao Zedong sixiang zhaoyaozhe wuju geming de shengli

ern dance-drama TheRed Detachment ofWomen),Hongqi,197o,7(July),
